name: Light Forsaken
description:
Another day, another Darkness.

This time it's a small-town shopping mall, enveloped by the miasmic shadow spilling from the veins of a universe torn asunder by the Collapse. Unnatural and unpredictable, the Darkness will slowly consume the minds of those caught within its crushing grip.

And that's where you come in. As an agent of Tenebrae, it's up to you to brave the distorted reality the Darkness leaves in its wake. Use your P.U.L.S.E. device to help navigate the void and rescue the civilians trapped inside before the Darkness can claim another victim.

Best of luck in there Agent.

Headphones are recommended for the best experience.

Both keyboard & mouse and gamepad controls are supported.
